    • Method Detail

      • getResource

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getResource(int id,
                                             java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.String description)
        This method implements GET API of RESTFul web services. this method is responsible for values available in database. it can return values based on some specific criteria.
        Parameters:
        id - serves as primary key in the database for each entry.
        name - name of the requested user.
        description - location of the requested user.
        Returns:
        return all possible result.

      • createResource

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createResource(Users objApplicationRequest)
        This method implements POST API of RESTFul web services. this method is responsible to save user data into database.
        Parameters:
        objApplicationRequest - user data in object format.
        Returns:
        success or any error message in case of failure.

      • updateResource

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateResource(int id,
                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                java.lang.String description)
        This method implements PUT API of RESTFul web services. this method update the existing user name based on some certain criteria and user new values.
        Parameters:
        id - primary key of every user data.
        name - name of the user, he wants to update.
        description - city of the user, he wants to update.
        Returns:
        success or error message in case of failure.

      • deleteResource

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteResource(int id,
                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                java.lang.String description)
        This method implements DELETE API of RESTFul web services. this method is responsible to delete a user details from database for which he queried.
        Parameters:
        id - primary key of the requested data.
        name - name of the requested user.
        description - city of the requested user.
        Returns:
        success or error message in case of failure.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
